title: Intermediate Developer
bulletpoints: Launched an Analytics Homepage product to guide users into starting their Analytics Journey, leading to a 60% increase in MAU
Implemented a Hot Module Reload system for Javascript/Typescript local development builds, leading to 30 seconds of saved time per code change for all developers

title: Full Stack Developer
bulletpoints: Built an Analytics Product in the Prompty App to surface event performance insights for event hosts

title: Developer Intern, Billing and Growth
